column2: "Good work. Your report is excellent. It looks like you've gotten the hang of the rod."
"You have a solid foundation now, so you can continue to learn."
"You can keep that rod. I hope you enjoy it."
"See you later. Don't let me find out you haven't been practicing with your rod."
"You can now call Marlu as a partner."

"A new Client Order is available for Jozsef.

Jozsef can be found in the Gate Area, second floor."
